external_games.name: Nasty Neighbors: No Picnic for Celebrity

name: Nasty Neighbors: No Picnic for Celebrity
storyline:
There are two main characters. Mityay is our character, a real real man, a hard worker, a specialist in special effects for movies. Ksyusha is our main headache, the face of the host of the TV show "The Unhealthy". Live these colorful characters next door in the same cottage community, and the relationship between them are very far from ideal - drunken parties of our show star does not give Mitya quietly sit on the courts of the porch to rest after work. And his revenge will be terrible.

As before, the aim of the game is to make the most mischief to the neighbor (in this case - the neighbor) and make his life unbearable. To do this, the developers will prepare three dozen of the most sophisticated methods to drive your neighbor to the brink. Moreover - the consequences of your actions will be visible throughout the game and even affect the further gameplay. Fully updated graphics are included.
summary: Russian point & click game, spiritual successor of Neighbours from Hell series and part of Pranksterz series.
